paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the BRCA2 gene variants, including penetrance data and individual records.

functional_data.summary: The variant causes premature protein truncation due to skipping of exon 7.

variants.segregation_data: The variant is believed to support viability in carriers.
variants.additional_notes: The study provides evidence of a minor transcript of BRCA2 that can support survival in homozygous carriers.
key_quotes: The hypomorphic nature of the mutations is believed to support viability.
This study provides the first in vivo evidence of the functional significance of a minor transcript of BRCA2.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data regarding the BRCA2 variant was extracted from the main text.
